reviewText: "Rights do not come from God, nature, logic, or law alone, but from particular experiences with injustice." Free translation -- the Holocaust narrative gives the Zionists all the rights to Palestine. No other human rights are of interest, nor have any even been issued before or since, as we all can see. Instead of taking advice on rights from a notorious opponent of human rights like Dershowitz, more on topic would be "Witness in Palestine: A Jewish American Woman in the Occupied Territories" by young Fulbright scholar Anna Baltzer, and her DVD "Life in Occupied Palestine: Eyewitness Stories & Photos"
